statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data;
SELECT campaign_name, total_impressions, total_clicks FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data WHERE total_budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_conversions FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data WHERE total_clicks > 1000 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data WHERE total_budget BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget, total_clicks FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data WHERE total_budget > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, total_impressions, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget, total_impressions, total_conversions FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' AND total_impressions > 50000;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_budget, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM marketing_campaign_performance_data WHERE total_clicks > total_conversions ORDER BY total_budget DESC, total_clicks ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, spend FROM campaign_performance_data;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM campaign_performance_data;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, spend FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance_data ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance_data.campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, SUM(spend) AS total_spend FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance_data ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance_data.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name, start_date, end_date;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM CampaignPerformanceData;
SELECT * FROM CampaignPerformanceData ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM CampaignPerformanceData WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions > 5;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM CampaignPerformanceData GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, revenue, profit FROM CampaignPerformanceData JOIN CampaignMetrics ON CampaignPerformanceData.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id WHERE revenue > cost;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, clicks FROM CampaignPerformanceData;
SELECT * FROM TrafficSources WHERE source_name = 'Google';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(cost), SUM(revenue), SUM(profit) FROM CampaignMetrics GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT source_name, SUM(impressions), SUM(clicks), SUM(conversions) FROM CampaignPerformanceData JOIN TrafficSources ON source_id = campaign_id GROUP BY source_name;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, date, cost, revenue, profit FROM CampaignPerformanceData JOIN CampaignMetrics ON CampaignPerformanceData.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id WHERE cost > 100 AND revenue > 500;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM Ads ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT ad_type, impressions, conversions FROM Ads WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, impressions FROM Ads ORDER BY impressions DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(spend) AS total_spend FROM Campaigns JOIN CampaignPerformance ON Campaigns.campaign_id = CampaignPerformance.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_spend > 1000;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, conversions FROM Ads WHERE clicks >= 100 AND ad_type = 'Text' ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT AdGroups.ad_group_name, COUNT(Ads.ad_id) AS num_ads FROM AdGroups LEFT JOIN Ads ON AdGroups.ad_group_id = Ads.ad_group_id GROUP BY AdGroups.ad_group_name ORDER BY num_ads DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM marketing_channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_size FROM audience_segments WHERE segment_size > 10000;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM campaign_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30' ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT cm.*, mc.campaign_name FROM campaign_metrics cm JOIN marketing_campaigns mc ON cm.campaign_id = mc.campaign_id WHERE cm.clicks > 100 AND mc.budget < 10000 ORDER BY cm.conversions DESC
SELECT channel_name, COUNT(*) as total_campaigns FROM marketing_channels GROUP BY channel_name ORDER BY total_campaigns DESC

SELECT mc.campaign_name, ce.date, ce.likes, ce.comments FROM marketing_campaigns mc INNER JOIN campaign_engagement ce ON mc.campaign_id = ce.campaign_id WHERE ce.likes > 50 AND ce.comments > 10 ORDER BY ce.date ASC
